Popular.description: Cappuccino is a classic Italian coffee made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. The bold espresso flavor is balanced by the creamy milk and light foam, often topped with a dusting of cocoa or cinnamon.
Popular.title: Cappoccino

Popular.description: Espresso is a strong, concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely ground beans, producing a rich flavor with a creamy layer of crema.
Popular.title: Espersso

Popular.description: Espresso is a concentrated coffee served in small, strong shots, made by forcing hot water through finely ground beans under high pressure. It has a rich flavor with a creamy layer called crema.
Popular.title: Affagato
